articles.title: 'I won't let this go': Cynthia Koh makes police report after Mercedes is vandalised - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The actress said there were “very long and deep scratches” on three panels of her car, and it had a punctured tyre, too.
articles.content:
Cynthia Koh had a very bad week last week when she found her red Mercedes damaged and vandalised in what appeared to be an intentional act.

articles.title: Accused shooter in Lady Gaga dog theft mistakenly freed - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The teenage gunman is facing an attempted murder charge for his part in the incident involving Lady Gaga’s dog walker, who was hit, choked and shot in a violent struggle before the singer’s two French bulldogs were stolen.
articles.content:
A gunman accused of shooting and seriously wounding Lady Gagas dog walker and stealing her two French bulldogs was mistakenly released from jail and is being sought, authorities said Friday.
